text: Somis is an unincorporated community in Ventura County, California. It was created in 1892 by Thomas Bard. Somis is in the Las Posas Valley"SUBSEQUENT ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT REPORT FOR FOCUSED GENERAL PLAN UPDATE and Related Amendments to the Non-Coastal Zoning Ordinance and Zone Change ZN05-0008" County of Ventura (June 22, 2005) on the south bank of Fox Barranca, just west of Arroyo Las Posas. As of 2020, the total population was 1,429. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in California Category:Settlements in Ventura County, California
title: Somis, California
